Do you expect inference cost per million tokens for frontier models to drop >85% by end of 2027?
Will inference cost become the single most decisive competitive factor among frontier AI labs by 2028?
How critical is strong explainability/interpretability for AI used in regulated or high-stakes domains in 2026?
Which interpretability method do you expect to become the de-facto standard for frontier models by 2030?
What remains the single largest unsolved problem in making large models mechanistically interpretable?
Would you accept 40–70% lower capability in exchange for dramatically better mechanistic explainability in regulated fields?
By 2032, will leading high-stakes AI systems be legally required to provide strong, auditable explanations?

surveys.surveyCategory: Sustainable AI Data Centers & Power Scaling

surveyQuestions.surveyQuestion: How concerned are you about the electricity & water consumption of frontier AI data centers in 2026?
Which clean energy path do you think will ultimately power most new AI data centers by 2035?
What is currently the biggest practical obstacle to building truly sustainable AI-scale data centers?
Would your organization pay 60–120% more for compute that is 100% clean & always-available?
By 2035, will most new frontier AI training runs occur in data centers co-located with dedicated clean power?

surveys.surveyCategory: Personal AI Twins & Digital Legacy Systems

surveyQuestions.surveyQuestion: Would you create and maintain a personal AI twin/digital clone of yourself in 2026?
What would be the #1 reason you would want a highly capable personal AI twin?
What is your single biggest concern about having a fully capable digital twin?
Would you allow your AI twin to continue existing, learning, and interacting after your death?
By 2040, will most people over 40 maintain a persistent digital AI twin as part of their extended identity?
How much more reliable do you consider AI-accelerated climate models compared to traditional GCMs in 2026?
Which AI-enabled climate intervention do you think has the highest realistic chance of large-scale deployment by 2040?
What is your biggest ethical or governance concern regarding AI in climate geoengineering?
Would you support carefully monitored, internationally coordinated AI-guided solar geoengineering field tests?
By 2050, will AI-managed climate interventions become the dominant global warming mitigation strategy?
How excited are you about AI autonomy playing a central role in deep-space exploration missions over the next 15 years?
Which deep-space mission type do you think will first become primarily AI-controlled with minimal human input?
What is your biggest concern about giving AI full control over critical deep-space assets?
Would you support a fully autonomous (no real-time human control) AI mission to another star system?
By 2045, will the majority of operational space assets be primarily managed by AI systems?
How concerned are you about the military applications and proliferation of frontier AI systems in 2026?
Which military use-case of frontier AI do you expect to reach operational maturity first by 2030?
What is your single biggest fear regarding the weaponization of superintelligent AI?
Do you support a binding international treaty banning fully autonomous lethal weapons?
Will AI arms races become the defining geopolitical conflict of the 2030s?
Do you feel that AI tools currently enhance or diminish your own creative process/output?
What should be the ideal long-term role of AI in serious artistic and creative work?
surveyAnswers: Tool only – human authorship must remain absolute

surveyQuestions.surveyQuestion: What concerns you most about AI's increasing dominance in creative industries?
Would you proudly release a major creative work that was 70%+ shaped by AI collaboration?
By 2040, will the most culturally impactful creative works still be primarily human-driven?
Have you used (or would you consider using) an AI system built specifically for mental health support?
Which quality would make you most likely to trust an AI-based mental health companion?
What is your biggest concern about relying on AI for mental/emotional health support?
If outcomes were proven equal or better, would you prefer an AI therapist over a human one?
By 2035, will AI companions provide the majority of first-line mental health support worldwide?
Do you feel AI tools have already increased your personal creative output and/or quality?
What should be the ideal relationship between humans and AI in high-level creative work?
surveyAnswers: AI as pure tool – human authorship absolute
Minimal AI involvement in fine art

surveyQuestions.surveyQuestion: What worries you most about the future of human originality in an AI-dominated creative landscape?
Would you feel authentic pride in releasing a major creative work that was 70%+ shaped by AI?
By 2040, will truly original, non-derivative human creativity still be clearly distinguishable from AI-generated content?

Which inference optimization breakthrough do you expect to have the largest real-world impact in the next 12–18 months?
What is currently the single biggest remaining barrier to cheap, widespread access to frontier-class inference?
Do you expect inference cost per million tokens for frontier models to drop >85% by the end of 2027 compared to today?

Has your organization meaningfully restructured operating models around AI agents & automation as of January 2026?
Which layer of organizational structure do you expect AI to disrupt most dramatically by 2030?
What is your single biggest concern about transitioning to deeply AI-native organizational models?
Do you believe most successful companies by 2035 will operate more like AI-orchestrated networks than traditional hierarchies?

surveys.surveyCategory: Longevity Tech & Personalized AI Medicine Outlook

surveyQuestions.surveyQuestion: How actively are you following or personally using AI-driven longevity & personalized health optimization tools in January 2026?
Which AI longevity application do you personally find most compelling right now?
What is your single biggest concern about AI in personal longevity & preventive medicine?
How much would you pay monthly for a high-quality AI longevity coach + continuous monitoring in 2026?
Do you believe AI will realistically add at least 5 healthy years to average human lifespan by 2040?
How concerned are you about distinguishing real vs AI-generated content in your daily information diet in January 2026?
Which digital provenance mechanism do you believe will become most widely adopted and trusted by 2030?
What do you see as the single biggest societal risk if strong digital provenance systems fail to scale?
Would you pay a small premium for content that is cryptographically proven to be human-created or authentic?
By 2030, will verifiable provenance become legally required for most professional media content?
Does your country or organization currently prioritize sovereign/national AI models and infrastructure in January 2026?
Which factor is currently the strongest driver toward sovereign AI development in your region?
What do you see as the single biggest downside of a heavily fragmented sovereign AI landscape?
By 2030, how many countries do you expect to have credible independent frontier-class AI capability?
Will geopolitical fragmentation of AI significantly slow overall global progress toward AGI?
How seriously is your country/company currently preparing for a post-AGI world (economic, governance, safety) in January 2026?
Which area do you believe needs the most urgent societal preparation if AGI arrives in the 2030s?
What worries you most about humanity's current level of readiness for superintelligence?
Do you believe most governments will have credible, enforceable AGI governance frameworks before the first AGI system arrives?
How emotionally attached would you allow yourself to become to an advanced AI companion by the early 2030s?
Which type of human–AI relationship do you think will become most common by 2035?
What concerns you most about deepening emotional bonds between humans and AI?
Do you believe strong emotional bonds with AI will improve overall human happiness and wellbeing in the long term?
How confident are you in current AI alignment/safety research progress relative to capability progress in January 2026?
Which technical approach do you currently consider most promising for scalable alignment of frontier models?
What do you believe is currently the single biggest unsolved problem in AI alignment?
Will we achieve acceptably robust alignment of superintelligent systems before they are widely deployed?
In which country/region do you believe the best frontier AI research will be conducted in 2027–2029?
How important have national borders/regulations become for top AI researchers’ choice of where to work in 2026?
What factor do you think will most determine which countries lead in frontier AI capability by 2030?
Do you expect the global distribution of frontier AI capability to become significantly more concentrated or more distributed by 2030?
On a scale from 1–10 in January 2026, how optimistic are you personally about the net impact of advanced AI on humanity by 2030?
Which statement best captures your current overall feeling about the AI trajectory as of January 2026?
What single factor most influences your level of optimism/pessimism about the AI future?
Looking back from January 2030, how do you think the years 2025–2029 will be remembered?
surveyAnswers: The point we should have paused
